text: “ I will do it when I ’ m multitasking, ” she tells the magazine. “ I can put it on before I breastfeed or put it on while I am making breakfast. I will put my mask on when I am doing those things and then I will jump into the shower to wash it off. ” Kerr next uses a rose quartz crystal ( she ’ s a big fan of those ) to massage more Noni oil – made from the Australian native fruit – into her face. “ I find that my face, especially in the morning, is really puffy so massaging it is really such a good way to stimulate circulation, ” she says.
